analysis.description:
Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_contracts/0x6ed8c49228397cbd0b62db04beaf0b7e9a4da93a.sol#278-288):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_contracts/0x6ed8c49228397cbd0b62db04beaf0b7e9a4da93a.sol#281-282)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_contracts/0x6ed8c49228397cbd0b62db04beaf0b7e9a4da93a.sol#285-287)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_contracts/0x6ed8c49228397cbd0b62db04beaf0b7e9a4da93a.sol#290-303):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_contracts/0x6ed8c49228397cbd0b62db04beaf0b7e9a4da93a.sol#297)
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_contracts/0x6ed8c49228397cbd0b62db04beaf0b7e9a4da93a.sol#297-298)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_contracts/0x6ed8c49228397cbd0b62db04beaf0b7e9a4da93a.sol#301)

TokenVesting.vestedAmount (/unique_contracts/0x6ed8c49228397cbd0b62db04beaf0b7e9a4da93a.sol#307-322) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < cliff (/unique_contracts/0x6ed8c49228397cbd0b62db04beaf0b7e9a4da93a.sol#315-322)
	- block.timestamp >= start.add(duration) || revoked[token] (/unique_contracts/0x6ed8c49228397cbd0b62db04beaf0b7e9a4da93a.sol#316-322)
